title: Leading 20 U.S. brands 2018 , by brand value
yAxis: Brand value in million U.S. dollars
summary: This bar chart has 20 columns on the x axis representing Brand, and Brand value in million U.S. dollars in each Brand on the y axis.
The Brand value in million U.S. dollars is highest at Brand Amazon and lowest at Brand Nike.
The highest Brand Amazon has 155484.0 more Brand value in million U.S. dollars than the lowest Brand Nike.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Brand value in million U.S. dollars for 20 number of Brands.
Brand Amazon has the highest Brand value in million U.S. dollars and Nike has the lowest Brand value in million U.S. dollars.
The maximum Brand Amazon has got 5.8 times higher Brand value in million U.S. dollars than the minimum Brand Nike.
Brand value in million U.S. dollars at Brand Amazon is 187905.0 , second place is  at 187905.0, and thirdly is Google at 142755.0.
